amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce Air Force Operation and Maintenance funding for aircraft logistics support by $24.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the amount for "Operation and Maintenance, Air Force" by $24,500,000 from $840,000,000 to $815,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 50 - 376 (Roll no. 172).
